Address.label: Address
Address.value: DISTRITO TELEFONICA, EDIFICIO CENTRAL. PLANTA 3,RONDA DE LA COMUNICACION S/N CENTRAL BUILDING AUDITORIUM, FLOOR 3, MADRID, 28050, Spain

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Telefonica operates mobile and fixed networks in Spain (where it is the incumbent telephone operator), U.K., Germany, Brazil, and other Latin American countries. The company derives more than 30% of its revenue from Spain, close to 20% from Germany and 20% from Brazil. Its U.K. operations are held through a joint venture with Virgin Media. In Latin America Telefonica operates in Mexico, Argentina, Chile, and Peru, among others.
